#### Log Axes

```{r}
library(plotly)
d <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ]
# without log scales
fig <- plot_ly(d, x = ~carat, y = ~price) %>% add_markers()

fig
```

```{r}
# with log scales
fig <- layout(fig, xaxis = list(type = "log"),
       yaxis = list(type = "log"))

fig
```
